DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to investigate the adverse events during upper gastrointestinal endoscopy with and without sedation in Chinese population
DOC.brief_title: Adverse Events During Upper Gastrointestinal Endoscopy
DOC.criteria: Patients will undergo upper gastrointestinal endoscopy Age > 18 years old Signed informed consent form Pregnant Allergy to propofol or soybean or albumen
